snippet: The court-martial began Monday for Staff Sgt. Luis Walker, one of 12 instructors at Lackland Air Force Base who are being investigated in a widening sexual abuse case.
abstract: Court-martial begins for Staff Sgt Luis Walker, one of 12 instructors at the Lackland Air Force Base in Texas who are being investigated in a widening sexual abuse case.
lead_paragraph: The court-martial began Monday for Staff Sgt. Luis Walker, one of 12 instructors at Lackland Air Force Base who are being investigated in a widening sexual abuse case.

headline.main: Texas: Court-Martial Is Under Way for Instructor Accused of Rape
headline.print_headline: Texas: Court-Martial Is Under Way For Instructor Accused of Rape
